mapper.select: SELECT a.cell_code,a.yyyyMMdd,COUNT(*) AS count,a.app_hour,a.app_result FROM (SELECT * FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1)) AS a WHERE a.app_result=0 GROUP BY a.cell_code

SELECT * FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE app_hour= (SELECT app_hour FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY app_hour DESC LIMIT 1) AND yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1)
and app_result = #{app_result}
SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT app_hour FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY app_hour DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info where cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT app_hour FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} and yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_info where cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY app_hour DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} and yyyyMMdd = #{time} limit 1

SELECT * FROM v_cell_result WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyymmdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyymmdd FROM v_cell_result ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY)
and cellname like #{cellname}
and result in (0,1)
ORDER BY yyyymmdd

SELECT * FROM v_cell_result WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyymmdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyymmdd FROM v_cell_result ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 30 DAY)
and cellname like #{cellname}
and result in (0,1)
ORDER BY yyyymmdd
